articles.title: Here's how Pat Sajak signed off his final 'Wheel of Fortune' episode - Good Morning America
articles.description: Pat Sajak signed off his final episode as host of "Wheel of Fortune" on Friday night.
articles.content:
After decades as host, Pat Sajak said goodbye to "Wheel of Fortune" Friday evening.
In his final episode, which aired June 7, Sajak, 77, shared a special message to the millions who have tuned in fo… [+5809 chars]
